text: Windham is a town in Windham County, Connecticut, United States. It contains the city of Willimantic and the villages of Windham Center, North Windham, and South Windham. The city of Willimantic was made part of the town in 1983. The population was 24,428 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Towns in Connecticut Category:County seats in Connecticut Category:1692 establishments Category:1690s establishments in Connecticut
title: Windham, Connecticut
